posts.post_text: December 2, 2020 at 8:50 PM#2several ways you could do this.you could specify the variable beforehand e.g:setvar $wingeffect = (which effect number?)assign effect $wingeffect /wing = 2which will assign the effect you just inputted a wing value of 2.you could probably do this without a variable at all with:assign effect (which effect number) /wings = 2though I'm not sure if that syntax works.
